text: Sabah Tani (died 19 February 2018) was a Bangladeshi singer in the 1980s and 1990s. Her most famous songs were "Kichhukhon", "Bhalobasa Bahurupi" and "Kono Baishakhi Raate Jodi". ==Personal life== Tani grew up in Karatia Union, Tangail. She had one son, Anid. In 2018, she died from low blood pressure. She was buried in a Gorai village in Tangail. ==References== Category:1960s births Category:2018 deaths Category:People from Tangail District Category:Year of birth missing Category:Bangladeshi singers Category:20th-century singers
title: Sabah Tani
